battle-deaths.title: Battle Deaths
battle-deaths.description: The number of deaths in state-based conflicts per 100,000 people has fallen to historic lows.
battle-deaths.valueColumn: Death rate in ongoing conflicts (best estimate) - Conflict type: extrasystemic

cereal-yield.title: Harvest
cereal-yield.description: The amount of cereal yield (in tonnes per hectare) has increased, meaning more food from the same land.

child-mortality.title: Children Dying
child-mortality.description: The percentage of children dying before their fifth birthday has dramatically declined.

co2-intensity.title: CO₂ Intensity
co2-intensity.description: Each dollar of world GDP now emits ~40% less CO₂ than in 1990.
co2-intensity.valueColumn: Annual CO₂ emissions per GDP (kg per international-$)

death-penalty.title: Death Penalty
death-penalty.description: The number of countries that have abolished the death penalty has steadily increased.

democracy.title: Democracy
democracy.description: The number of countries that are electoral or liberal democracies has increased significantly.

disaster-deaths.title: Deaths from Disaster
disaster-deaths.description: The number of people killed by natural disasters has fallen significantly over the last century.

electricity.title: Electricity Coverage
electricity.description: The share of people with some access to electricity has grown.

extreme-poverty.title: Extreme Poverty
extreme-poverty.description: The share of humanity living on less than $3/day has fallen from >40% in 1981 to <10% today.
extreme-poverty.valueColumn: Share of population in poverty ($3 a day, 2021 prices) - Income or consumption consolidated

girls-school.title: Girls in School
girls-school.description: The share of girls of primary school age who are enrolled has risen to near-parity with boys.
girls-school.valueColumn: Net enrollment rates in primary education, adjusted gender parity index

homicide-rate.title: Homicide Rate
homicide-rate.description: Intentional killings per 100k people have fallen by a third since the early 1990s.
homicide-rate.valueColumn: Homicide rate per 100,000 population - sex: Total - age: Total

hunger.title: Hunger
hunger.description: The share of people who are undernourished has been falling.

internet.title: Internet
internet.description: The share of people using the internet has seen rapid growth.
internet.valueColumn: Individuals using the Internet (% of population)

leaded-gasoline.title: Leaded Gasoline
leaded-gasoline.description: The number of countries using leaded gasoline has dropped to just a few.

legal-slavery.title: Legal Slavery
legal-slavery.description: The number of countries where slavery is legal has dropped from 194 in 1800 to just 3 today.
legal-slavery.valueColumn: Number of countries where slavery is legal

life-expectancy.title: Life Expectancy
life-expectancy.description: Average life expectancy has climbed from 52 years in 1960 to 73 years in 2023.

literacy.title: Literacy
literacy.description: The share of adults who are literate has risen dramatically.
literacy.valueColumn: Literacy rate, adult total (% of people ages 15 and above)

maternal-mortality.title: Maternal Deaths
maternal-mortality.description: Global maternal deaths have more than halved since 1990.

mobile-phones.title: Mobile Phones
mobile-phones.description: The share of people with a mobile phone subscription has skyrocketed.

nuclear-warheads.title: Nuclear Arms
nuclear-warheads.description: The total number of nuclear warheads has been reduced since the Cold War peak.

oil-spills.title: Oil Spills
oil-spills.description: The volume of oil spilled from tankers has significantly decreased.

ozone-depletion.title: Ozone Depletion
ozone-depletion.description: The production of ozone-depleting substances has been almost entirely phased out.
ozone-depletion.valueColumn: Consumption of controlled substance (zero-filled) - Chemical: Methyl Chloroform (TCA)

plane-deaths.title: Plane Crash Deaths
plane-deaths.description: Aviation fatalities per million passengers have dramatically declined, making flying safer than ever.

protected-areas.title: Protected Nature
protected-areas.description: The share of the Earth's land surface that is protected as national parks and other reserves has increased.
protected-areas.valueColumn: Terrestrial protected areas (% of total land area)

protected-land.title: Protected Land
protected-land.description: The share of land under legal protection has grown from virtually zero to nearly 18%.

renewable-energy.title: Clean Power
renewable-energy.description: Renewables' share of global electricity has doubled in a decade, passing 30% in 2024.

sanitation-access.title: Improved Sanitation
sanitation-access.description: Two-thirds of humanity had safe sanitation in 2022, up from half in 2000.
sanitation-access.valueColumn: Share of the population using safely managed sanitation services

scientific-papers.title: Science
scientific-papers.description: The number of scholarly articles published per year has seen exponential growth.

smallpox.title: Smallpox
smallpox.description: The number of countries with smallpox has been eliminated (the disease is eradicated).

smoking-prevalence.title: Smoking
smoking-prevalence.description: Global smoking rates have fallen by roughly a quarter since 1990, saving millions of lives.
smoking-prevalence.valueColumn: Share of adults who smoke or use tobacco (age-standardized)

so2-emissions.title: Smoke Particles
so2-emissions.description: The amount of smoke particles (SO₂) emitted per person has decreased.
so2-emissions.valueColumn: Sulfur dioxide emissions from all sectors

solar-price.title: Expensive Solar Panels
solar-price.description: The price of solar energy has plummeted.

water-access.title: Water
water-access.description: The share of people with access to a protected water source has increased.
water-access.valueColumn: Share of the population using at least basic drinking water services
